title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 2.10 - Service of all papers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 2.10 - Service of all papers

State Regulations

Except as otherwise provided by statute: (a) All papers to be served upon the
superintendent may be served personally or by registered mail upon him, upon
such deputy superintendent as he may designate for that purpose, or upon his
attorney of record in the proceeding. (b) All papers to be served upon the
respondent may be served personally or by registered mail upon such respondent
or upon his attorney of record. (c) All papers to be filed with the Banking Board shall be filed with the secretary
thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง
2.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
